dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7002 IH: Gateway Solidarity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Wagner (for herself, Ms. Bush, Mr. Luetkemeyer, Mrs. Hartzler, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Graves of Missouri, Mr. Long, and Mr. Smith of Missouri) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To authorize the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, Missouri, to be illuminated by blue and yellow lights in support of Ukraine.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Gateway Solidarity Act.

section.header: Illumination of the Gateway Arch in support of Ukraine
section.text: To show support and solidarity with the Ukrainian people, the Secretary of the Interior shall authorize the Gateway Arch in St. Louis, Missouri, to be illuminated by blue and yellow lights for a certain period of time, to be designated by the Secretary of the Interior.
